Input: two java code with similar behaviour
while loop: "class Test {public static void main(String[] args) {int i = 1; while (i < 6) { i++; }}}"
for loop: "class Test {public static void main(String[] args) {for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++){}}}"
Expected output: the class/method declaration should have similar values
